casebody.data:
BOICE-WILLIS CLINIC, P.A.
v.
DAVID S.S. No. 2P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2006. George J. Oliver, Sidney S. Eagles, Jr., Raleigh, John W. Mann, for Boice-Willis Clinic, P.A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of January 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending the determination of the defendant's petition for discretionary review by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of January 2006."
